programme.title: Halloween Ends
programme.desc: The long-suffering Laurie Strode rebuilds her life in Haddonfield with granddaughter Allyson. She is determined to lay to rest the ghost of her tormentor, Michael Myers, but discomfort resurfaces when Allyson forms a romantic attachment to twentysomething misfit Corey Cunningham. Before long, evil returns to Haddonfield, and Laurie faces her greatest fear once more. programme.title: Book of Love
programme.desc: Young, uptight and unsuccessful English writer Henry's latest novel sells poorly. But when the book suddenly becomes a surprise hit in Mexico, his publicist insists he travel there on a promotional tour. Upon arrival, a confused Henry discovers the reason behind the popularity - Mexican translator Maria has rewritten the dull book as a steamy erotic story. programme.title: Hypnotic
programme.sub-title: Mystery, Thriller, Drama, Action, Sci Fi ║ 2023 ║ 15
programme.desc: Police detective Danny Rourke is haunted by the abduction of his seven-year-old daughter Minnie from a park. programme.title: No Hard Feelings
programme.desc: Faced with the possibility of losing her mother's house, a woman called Maddie answers an advert from a married couple, who are offering a Buick Regal car to anyone willing to 'date' their introverted 19-year-old son Percy before he attends college. Maddie promises to bring the teenager out of his shell. programme.title: Transformers: Rise Of The Beasts
programme.sub-title: Action, Fantasy, War, Drama, Sci Fi ║ 2023 ║ 12A
programme.desc: In 1994 New York City, ex-serviceman Noah Diaz accepts a job from neighbourhood chancer Reek to steal a sports car. The high-end vehicle turns out to be robot-in-disguise Mirage, who propels Noah into the midst of a hunt for a precious Transwarp key. The device will allow Autobot leader Optimus Prime and his mechanised compatriots to return home to Cybertron. programme.title: Ruby Gillman, Teenage Kraken
programme.sub-title: Action, Fantasy, Drama, Animation, Comedy, Family, Children's ║ 2023 ║ PG
programme.desc: Shy teenager Ruby Gillman is a kraken who lives on dry land in Oceanside with parents Arthur and Agatha and her younger brother Sam. A failed prom proposal culminates in Ruby plunging into the sea, and finally she discovers she is destined to inherit the throne from her kraken grandmother. programme.title: Ruby Gillman, Teenage Kraken
programme.sub-title: Action, Fantasy, Drama, Animation, Comedy, Family, Children's ║ 2023 ║ PG
programme.desc: Shy teenager Ruby Gillman is a kraken who lives on dry land in Oceanside with parents Arthur and Agatha and her younger brother Sam. programme.sub-title: Action, Drama, Sci Fi, Comedy, Fantasy ║ 1986 ║ PG
programme.desc: Science-fiction adventure starring William Shatner, Leonard Nimoy and DeForest Kelley. programme.desc: Martial arts thriller, starring Jackie Chan as a salesman at a exercise equipment store, who has dreams of living a more adventurous life. programme.title: Best of F1 2023
programme.desc: Steeped in history, Spa is set for the next chapter to be written as the lights go out at the 2023 Belgian Grand Prix. Last year's race saw Max Verstappen head a Red Bull one-two. (30.07).

programme.title: Dutch F1 GP Highlights
programme.desc: Fresh from a summer break, Formula 1 returns to a sea of orange for the 2023 Dutch Grand Prix, as Red Bull's Max Verstappen makes his homecoming as the world championship leader. (27.08).

programme.title: Best of F1 2023
programme.desc: Known as the Temple of Speed, Monza sets the stage for the 2023 Italian Grand Prix - the same stage Max Verstappen topped just a year ago. (03.09).

programme.title: Best of F1 2023
programme.desc: Among the most physically demanding races on the calendar - this is the Singapore Grand Prix. Carlos Sainz starts from pole position and George Russell joins him on the front row. (17.09).

programme.title: Best of F1 2023
programme.desc: The 2023 Japanese Grand Prix starts here. Ahead of the McLarens, Max Verstappen returned to his imperious best to lock in pole. His Red Bull team-mate Sergio Perez starts from P5. (24.09).

programme.title: Best of F1 2023
programme.desc: The 2023 Qatar Grand Prix sees the fourth F1 Sprint of the season. Oscar Piastri starts from P1. (07.10).

programme.title: Best of F1 2023
programme.desc: Two years on from the inaugural Qatar Grand Prix, Lusail welcomes F1 racing once more. George Russell and Lewis Hamilton follow the newly crowned world champion Max Verstappen. (08.10).

programme.title: U.S. F1 Sprint
programme.desc: The 2023 United States Grand Prix sees the fifth F1 Sprint this season. Putting Friday behind him, Max Verstappen starts from P1 with Charles Leclerc and Lewis Hamilton behind. (21.10).

programme.title: U.S. F1 GP Highlights
programme.desc: After taking Sprint victory, Max Verstappen starts from sixth for the 2023 United States Grand Prix. Charles Leclerc and Lando Norris are on the front row with Lewis Hamilton third. (22.10).

programme.title: The F1 Show:Lewis Hamilton Special
programme.desc: Recorded before official confirmation of Lewis Hamilton's 2025 switch from Mercedes to Ferrari, the Sky Sports F1 team sat down to react to the news.

programme.title: Best of F1 2023
programme.desc: It's race day at the 2023 Mexico City Grand Prix. Taking place at the Autodromo Hermanos Rodriguez, Charles Leclerc starts in pole with his Ferrari teammate Carlos Sainz in second. (29.10).

programme.title: Best of F1 2023
programme.desc: On race day at Interlagos, it's lights out for the Sao Paulo Grand Prix. Yesterday's Sprint winner Max Verstappen starts from pole and is joined by Charles Leclerc on the front row. (05.11).

programme.title: Las Vegas F1 Grand Prix Highlights
programme.desc: It's lights out at the Las Vegas Grand Prix. Set against one of the most vibrant backdrops F1 has ever seen, it was Charles Leclerc who lit up qualifying to put his Ferrari on pole. (18.11).

programme.title: Abu Dhabi F1 GP Highlights
programme.desc: For the final time this year, Formula 1 goes racing as Yas Marina Circuit stages the Abu Dhabi Grand Prix. Will Max Verstappen bookend a record-breaking season with a 19th race win? (26.11).

programme.title: Best of F1 2023
programme.desc: In a year of F1 that sees more races than ever before, the ride begins with the 2023 Bahrain Grand Prix. Max Verstappen is joined by Sergio Perez in a Red Bull front-row lockout. (05.03).

programme.title: Best of F1 2023
programme.desc: On the front row, pole-sitter Sergio Perez is joined by Fernando Alonso as George Russell completes the top three for the Saudi Arabian Grand Prix. Max Verstappen starts from P15. (19.03).

programme.title: Graham Hill - World Champion
programme.desc: On the 60th anniversary of Graham Hill clinching the 1962 F1 World Championship for BRM, Damon Hill celebrates his father's achievement at the Goodwood Revival.

programme.title: Lawson the AlphaTauri Supersub
programme.desc: Ahead of the Japanese Grand Prix, Sky F1's Rachel Brookes caught up with super-sub Liam Lawson who's been filling the vacant AlphaTauri seat in the absence of the injured Daniel Ricciardo.

programme.title: Max's Record Breaking Season
programme.desc: Naomi Schiff looks back on Max Verstappen's dominant 2023 season ahead of the Qatar Grand Prix, a venue where he could secure his third world championship title.

programme.title: Jess Hawkins Makes History
programme.desc: After multiple failed attempts due to bad weather, Aston Martin's Driver Ambassador Jess Hawkins finally becomes the first woman to drive a Formula 1 car since 2018.

programme.title: Best of F1 2023
programme.desc: On Sunday at Albert Park, Max Verstappen has pole with George Russell joining the world champion on the front row for the 2023 Australian Grand Prix. Lewis Hamilton starts in third. (02.04).

programme.title: Box Box Box: Red Bull's 1st Win
programme.desc: Christian Horner joins Martin Brundle at the Sky Cinema to relive Red Bull Racing's first victory at the incredibly wet 2009 Chinese Grand Prix.

programme.title: Best of F1 2023
programme.desc: The Azerbaijan Grand Prix sees the first of six F1 Sprints. With Ferrari's Charles Leclerc on pole in a 100km dash, the drivers race all the way to the chequered flag. (29.04).

programme.title: Best of F1 2023
programme.desc: The 2023 Azerbaijan Grand Prix has arrived as Baku prepares for 51 laps of high-octane racing. Charles Leclerc's immense one-lap pace in Friday's qualifying secured Ferrari pole. (30.04).

programme.title: 2023 Season Funnies
programme.desc: It's not always plain sailing for the Sky F1 team, so sit back and watch this year's outtakes. Plus, relive some of the mega moments of 2023.

programme.title: Norris Reflects on 2023
programme.desc: McLaren's Lando Norris reflects on a busy and disappointing Las Vegas Grand Prix and looks ahead to the Abu Dhabi race with Sky F1's Naomi Schiff.

programme.title: Graham Hill - World Champion
programme.desc: On the 60th anniversary of Graham Hill clinching the 1962 F1 World Championship for BRM, Damon Hill celebrates his father's achievement at the Goodwood Revival.

programme.title: Miami F1 Grand Prix
programme.desc: The wait is over - it's Formula 1 race day at the Miami International Autodrome in Florida. Sergio Perez starts on pole with Fernando Alonso also on the front row. (07.05).

programme.title: Ferrari's Austin Track Challenge
programme.desc: Ferrari pair Charles Leclerc and Carlos Sainz are reunited with Simon Lazenby and Rachel Brookes for another track challenge in Austin.

programme.title: Max's Record 2024 F1 Season
programme.desc: Sky F1's Damon Hill takes a look at Max Verstappen's record-breaking 2023 - a year that saw the Dutchman add a third world championship to his growing résumé in Formula 1.

programme.title: F1 Highlights
programme.desc: Steeped in history, Spa is set for the next chapter to be written as the lights go out at the 2023 Belgian Grand Prix. Last year's race saw Max Verstappen head a Red Bull one-two.

programme.title: F1 Highlights
programme.desc: Fresh from a summer break, Formula 1 returns to a sea of orange for the 2023 Dutch Grand Prix, as Red Bull's Max Verstappen makes his homecoming as the world championship leader.

programme.title: F1 Highlights
programme.desc: Known as the Temple of Speed, Monza sets the stage for the 2023 Italian Grand Prix - the same stage Max Verstappen topped just a year ago.

programme.title: F1 Highlights
programme.desc: Among the most physically demanding races on the calendar - this is the Singapore Grand Prix. One of F1's strongest street performers Sergio Perez won here in last year.

programme.title: F1 Highlights
programme.desc: Highlights of the 2023 Japanese Grand Prix. Last year, this race proved to be a pivotal one in the championship, as Max Verstappen became a two-time world champion at Suzuka.

programme.title: F1 Highlights
programme.desc: The 2023 Qatar Grand Prix sees the fourth of six F1 Sprints this season. In a 100km dash, the drivers race to the chequered flag for a haul of world championship points.

programme.title: F1 Highlights
programme.desc: Two years on from the inaugural Qatar Grand Prix, Losail International Circuit welcomes Formula 1 racing once more. Lewis Hamilton took the chequered flag in P1 here back in 2021.

programme.title: F1 Highlights
programme.desc: The 2023 United States Grand Prix sees the fifth F1 Sprint this season. Putting Friday behind him, Max Verstappen starts from P1 with Charles Leclerc and Lewis Hamilton behind.

programme.title: F1 Highlights
programme.desc: After taking Sprint victory, Max Verstappen starts from sixth for the 2023 United States Grand Prix. Charles Leclerc and Lando Norris are on the front row with Lewis Hamilton third.

programme.title: The F1 Show
programme.desc: Following the news of Lewis Hamilton's 2025 switch to Ferrari, we have all the reaction to the seven-time world champion's shock move away from Mercedes.

programme.title: F1 Highlights
programme.desc: Seventy-one laps of the Autodromo Hermanos Rodriguez start here as the lights go out at the 2023 Mexico City Grand Prix. Max Verstappen has won the previous two races here.

programme.title: F1 Highlights
programme.desc: Action from the 2023 Sao Paulo Grand Prix at Interlagos. In what was the first Formula 1 race win of his career, George Russell led a Mercedes one-two here a year ago.

programme.title: F1 Highlights
programme.desc: It's lights out at the Las Vegas Grand Prix. Set against one of the most vibrant backdrops F1 has ever seen, the 2023 field of drivers are set to tackle this all-new circuit.

programme.title: F1 Highlights
programme.desc: For the final time this year, Yas Marina Circuit stages the climax to the 2023 season as the lights go out for the Abu Dhabi Grand Prix.
